duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze, design, develop, and implement software projects and operational maintenance Data hub tasks using Heroku platform.
Evaluate existing solutions and recommend potential Heroku-enabled enhancements.
Develop or update support documentation as needed and lead Peer Review to allow acceptance of systems changes into production.
Collaborate with other Business and IT partner teams on successful delivery of product enhancements and support.
Work with testers and DevOps engineers for testing and deploying web applications on the Heroku platform.
Partner with the team to debug and diagnose complex defects, conduct root cause analysis, and make resolution recommendations.
Maintain technical skills and expertise through continuing education and training.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Electrical/Electronic Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field (Heroku Certification preferred)
